value.title: Attendance Records
value.instructions:
The Student Chapter for the Association for Computing Machinery (ACM)\nrequested
your help. Throughout the semester, attendance \nfor the weekly club meetings
has been very unpredictable. The club \nkeeps track of attendance each week
but would like to have a\nmaster attendance list for the semester. Given a
``String`` array, \ncreate an ``ArrayList`` of all members of the ACM club.
